com.uofa.adventure_app.activity

Class StoryActivity<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.uofa.adventure_app.interfaces.AdventureActivity
        • com.uofa.adventure_app.activity.StoryActivity<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataReturn<Story>

    public class StoryActivity<T>
extends AdventureActivity
    Displays the Fragements in the story so that the user can read them. It allows the user to go to the next fragement of the users choosing
    Author:
    Kevin Lafond, Chris Pavlicek
